text.__SUMMARY__: Candida sharkiensis is a yeast species first found in the Florida Everglades.
text.Further reading: Fell, Jack W.;  et al. (2011). "Five new species of yeasts from fresh water and marine habitats in the Florida Everglades". Antonie van Leeuwenhoek. 99 (3): 533–549. doi:10.1007/s10482-010-9521-6. PMID 20967499.
